summary: Based on the childhood memories of actor Michael Degen, the movie deals with the everyday struggle to survive as a Jewish boy in Nazi Germany. As his father had died in 1940 after being ... See full summary »
cast: Nadja Uhl|Aaron Altaras|Hannelore Elsner|Dagmar Manzel|Maria Simon|Katharina Thalbach|Richy Müller|Axel Prahl|Merab Ninidze|Martin Stührk|Steffi Kühnert|Maria Hofstätter|Michael Schenk|Michael Gerber|Holger Kunkel|Yevgeni Sitokhin|Manfred Möck|Katharina Spiering|Katharina Eckerfeld|Petra Schmidt-Schaller|Sven Riemann|Franziska Kleinert|Waléra Kanischtscheff|Karl Alexander Seidel|Regine Zimmermann
title: Marcados por el Tercer Reich
